title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CAMC Health (Charleston, WV) in Jun 2023
Interview Descriptions: It was really easy. Over the phone. Manager described the unit, pt population, turnovers, even gave tips on where to go to hangout. Manager also talked about the different units and how overflow works
Interview Questions: What level icu are you used to working?

title: Desktop Support Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at CAMC Health in Aug 2022
Interview Descriptions: Interview itself was great, everyone was nice and attentive. The rest of the hiring process is very slow and annoying. Shouldn’t take weeks on end to select a candidate and get everything finalized.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself. What was a situation where you went above and beyond?

title: Registered Nurse ICU Interview
Interview Descriptions: Interview was disorganized because it wasn't with the actual hiring manager (could not be there.) I felt like I was the one trying to keep it afloat and fluid. Afterwards, there was a tour of the hospital. Never got a call back even after leaving a message to follow up.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work in ICU?

title: Health Unit Coordinator (HUC) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at CAMC Health (Kanawha City, WV) in Oct 2021
Interview Descriptions: Very quick process. Took about a week and a half to get hired. Went for an interview on Monday and was hired but the end of the week. Was lied to multiple times but continued to go through the hiring process.

title: Recourse Pt Sitter Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CAMC Health (Charleston, WV) in Jul 2021
Interview Descriptions: 3rd floor at memorial. I'm a former employee so pretty simple go in talk explain your abilities. I'm a former medical assistant so I have medical knowledge. I was told the hours the places etc...
Interview Questions: Why do you want the job.

title: X-Ray Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CAMC Health (Charleston, WV) in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions: Great interaction and helpful with any questions asked. Was very comfortable and able to answer interview questions to the best of my ability without being nervous. Was given a tour of the department afterwards.

title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CAMC Health
Interview Descriptions: Professional, friendly, informative. A tour was given to me afterwards and all my questions were answered. I was given a time frame as to when I would hear back from them if I was going to be offered a position or not.
Interview Questions:
Where do I see myself in 5 years? 
What experience do I have that would be helpful in this position? 
What are my strengths and weaknesses?

title: Nursing Assistant Interview
Interview Descriptions: I loved my interviewer. It was quick and easy. I was called a few days after I applied and received a job offer the next day. Everyone I met was super nice.

title: Health Unit Coordinator (HUC) Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at CAMC Health (Charleston, WV) in May 2019
Interview Descriptions: LITERALLY will take any living person. So understaffed they are recruiting housekeeping and off site employees. Show up or phone in and don’t have a felony and you are almost guaranteed a job
Interview Questions: How well do you work with others

title: Research Assistant Interview
Interview Descriptions: Easy going and relaxed atmosphere. Nothing overly intimidating. Group interview and individual interview. One of the most inviting atmosphere's I have experienced. I just recommend going in prepared and being able to answer questions about your qualifications as they pertain to the position.

title: Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at CAMC Health (Charleston, WV) in Feb 2019
Interview Descriptions: Went over the job requirements and responsibilities then took a tour of the unit. Was also given a brief navigation of the documentation set up they use. I was introduced to most of the staff and shown all the areas in which I would use frequently.
Interview Questions: How long have you been doing work relevant to this position?

title: Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at CAMC Health (Charleston, WV) in Feb 2018
Interview Descriptions: I was contacted after applying for an interview for the family medicine clinic on the 5th floor of Memorial. The interview was friendly, efficient, and I was shown the entire clinic quickly while stopping to see if anybody else had questions for me before meeting with the lady in the lab for the clinic floor. The most interesting question for everyone was if I were scared of phlebotomy.
Interview Questions: Are you scared of phlebotomy? Are you comfortable with EKGs?

title: Admitting Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CAMC Health (Charleston, WV)
Interview Descriptions: Basic Questions.  Very informal- only interviewed with HR over phone screening and then with Supervisor of office. Went over hours, dress code, and asked if I had any additional questions.
Interview Questions: How to handle an difficult patient

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at CAMC Health (Charleston, WV) in Dec 2016
Interview Descriptions: Interview process was completely in a timely manner with two individuals in the process.  One supervisor and the department manager.  They asked pertinent questions and allowed plenty of time for questions that I had.  I was introduced to a few other staff members.  The job offer was completed in a timely manner as well.
Interview Questions: They asked basic questions such as:  personal strengths and weaknesses, also about previous experience in nursing.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at CAMC Health (Charleston, WV)
Interview Descriptions: I had a phone interview with HR and they asked me very basic interview questions.  It was probably the easiest interview I have ever had.The interview was very laid back and was not strict at all.
Interview Questions: What is a difficult nursing situation I have been in?

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at CAMC Health (Charleston, WV) in Mar 2014
Interview Descriptions: Mass interview following graduation with several different floor managers. It was conducted as group interviews with 3 other candidates each time. Each interview was about 15 minutes then you would rotate through about 4 interviewers. Following the interviews you would rank the interviews and if they ranked you well then you would get a phone call for a position. You must accept or reject the job immediately.
Interview Questions: What shift you were willing to work.

title: Case Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at CAMC Health (Charleston, WV) in Jun 2010
Interview Descriptions: Honest, hard working, motivated individuals will succeed here.
